verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Put on the garments of praise
For the spirit of heaviness
Let the oil of gladness fall down from your throne
Put on the garments of praise
For the spirit of heaviness
Your joy is my strength oh Lord

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Make these broken weary bones made to dance again
Wet this dry and thirsty land with a river
Lord, our eyes are fixed on you
We are waiting
For your garland of grace
As we praise your name

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Hallelujah sing hallelujah
We give all honour and praise to Your name
